EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Invite - New Sessions/New Sponsors - 5/10
EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing sessions from Netflix, Google, Comcast, Home Depot, and more
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>
Featured Sessions from Spring Team, Netflix, Google, Comcast, Home Depot and more
Meet industry leaders from Netflix, Google, Comcast, Home Depot, Kroger, Express Scripts and connect with thousands of peers facing similar challenges. Join top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the current and future impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016. The ticket price increases again June 11, so register now <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]> to save $300.00 and remember to book the hotel! <[[http://springoneplatform.io/travel]]>
Pre-conference training July 31â€”Aug 1st: Spring Cloud Data Flow class added
Expert instructors from Pivotal Education are offering discounted training before the event! Choose from a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne Platform conference. Training ticket prices increase on June 11, so register now for these in-depth trainings on the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save. Check out the new Spring Cloud Data Flow training!
Developing Applications with Cloud Foundry <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#developing-applications-with-cloud-foundry]]> Building the Connected Car <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#building-the-connected-car]]> Spring Cloud Services <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-services]]> Spring Boot Primer <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-boot-primer]]> Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-data-flow]]>
Aria Resort and Casino <[[https://www.aria.com/]]> 3730 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89158, United States [map <[[https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/ARIA+Resort+%26+Casino+Las+Vegas/@36.106659,-115.176909,16z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c8c42e1d156485:0x2ef3882f44b3056f?hl=en]]>] (702) 590-7111 <[[tel:17025907111]]>
Join the conversation at SpringOne Platform 2016!
Register Today! <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]>
We hope to see you there,
The Pivotal <[[pivotal.io]]> team
